author: Snazzy Labs
description:
iPadOS 26 is a big learning curve—learn what I’ve done to switch from a Mac full-time.
✨ One robot vacuum that handles thresholds, obstacles, and every corner👇 
Mova V50 Ultra on Amazon: https://amzn.to/4691Y9N
Mova V50 Ultra on Official Website: https://bit.ly/48h200A

Follow Snazzy Labs on Twitter - https://twitter.com/snazzylabs

The new M4 iPad Pro running iPadOS 26 has officially replaced my MacBook Air, Mac mini, and even my Apple Vision Pro as my main computer. In this video I show you how I built a full-time iPad workflow, from Apple’s new windowed multitasking modes, Stage Manager improvements, and background tasks, to productivity hacks with Shortcuts, Apple Intelligence AI automation, and the updated Files app. If you’ve ever wondered can the iPad replace a Mac or how to make the most of
title: From Mac to iPad: How I Switched
